original: 廣漢郪縣人，蜀漢官員。其人好議論，且喜大放厥詞，後因在諸葛亮死後批評其「身杖強兵，狼顧虎視」，指諸葛亮囂張跋扈，令後主劉禪震怒，下令處死。
text: A native of Li County, Guanghan, an official of Shuhan. He was arrogant and liked to speak out. Later, after Zhuge Liang's death, he criticized Zhuge Liang for "strengthening the soldier with a stick, and watching the tiger by the wolf." He pointed out that Zhuge Liang was arrogant and domineering.
